alert.note: Alert for Taliaferro; Wilkes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 3:45PM EDT until August 27 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Taliaferro County in east central Georgia... Southern Wilkes County in east central Georgia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 345 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ficklin, or near Washington, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Washington, Sharon, Aonia, Ficklin, Lundberg, Danburg, Rocky Creek Fire Dept., Metasville, Floral Hill, Holliday Park, and Raytown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
